name: apache_lookup_uri
purpose: Perform a partial request for the specified URI and return all info about it

return.description:
An object of related URI information. The properties of
   this object are:status
    the_request
    status_line
    method
    content_type
    handler
    uri
    filename
    path_info
    args
    boundary
    no_cache
    no_local_copy
    allowed
    send_bodyct
    bytes_sent
    byterange
    clength
    unparsed_uri
    mtime
    request_time
